```{r setup, include = FALSE, echo=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(dplyr)
```

**Project:** `r params$project`

### Approximate Greenhouse Gas Emission Reductions

```{r}
kbl_all <- kbl(params$table, 
    col.names = c(paste0("MLRA", footnote_marker_alphabet(1)),
                  "County",
                  "Class",
                  "Practice",
                  "Implementation",
                  "Acres",
                  paste0("Carbon Dioxide", footnote_marker_alphabet(2)),
                  paste0("Nitrous Oxide", footnote_marker_alphabet(2)),
                  paste0("Methane", footnote_marker_alphabet(2)),
                  paste0("Total Greenhouse Gases", footnote_marker_alphabet(2))
                  ),
    format.args = list(big.mark = ","),
    escape = FALSE,
    booktabs = TRUE) %>% 
  kable_styling(full_width = TRUE) %>% 
  footnote(alphabet = c("Major Land Resource Area",
                        "Metric tonnes CO2eq per year")) %>% 
  row_spec(row = 0, bold = TRUE) %>% 
  column_spec(column = c(1:3), width = "5em") %>% 
  column_spec(column = c(4:5), width = "10em") %>% 
  column_spec(column = c(6:9), width = "5em")

kbl_all
```

### Summary of Approximate Greenhouse Gas Emission Reductions by County

```{r}
kbl_summary <- kbl(params$summary, 
    col.names = c(paste0("MLRA", footnote_marker_alphabet(1)),
                  "County",
                  "Unique Practice Implementations",
                  "Total Acres",
                  paste0("Total Greenhouse Gases", footnote_marker_alphabet(2))
                  ), 
    format.args = list(big.mark = ","),
    escape = FALSE,
    booktabs = TRUE) %>% 
  kable_styling(full_width = TRUE) %>% 
  row_spec(row = 0, bold = TRUE) %>% 
  footnote(alphabet = c("Major Land Resource Area",
                        "Metric tonnes CO2eq per year"))

kbl_summary
```
